meanings.definition: A network of interconnected lines or channels
meanings.sent1: The reseaux of roads in the city made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The internet is a vast reseaux connecting people worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The reseaux of vines in the garden looked like a beautiful maze.
meanings.sent4: The reseaux of wires in the computer resembled a complex spider web.
meanings.sent5: The reseaux of pipes in the building ensured efficient water flow.

meanings.definition: A system of intersecting lines or channels
meanings.sent1: The reseaux of train tracks crisscrossed the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The reseaux of rivers in the delta created a unique ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The reseaux of roads in the town seemed to play a game of 'follow the leader'.
meanings.sent4: The reseaux of veins in the leaf formed intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: The reseaux of power lines above our heads hummed with electricity.

meanings.sent1: The reseaux of squares on the quilt gave it a cozy look.
meanings.sent2: The reseaux of windows on the skyscraper created a modern facade.
meanings.sent3: The reseaux of chocolate drizzle on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The reseaux of shadows from the fence fell across the garden.
meanings.sent5: The reseaux of stars in the night sky twinkled like diamonds.
